import { ArrowBackIosOutlined, ArrowForwardIosOutlined } from '@material-ui/icons' import React, { useRef } from 'react' import ListItem from '../ListItem/ListItem' import './List.scss' function List() { const listRef = useRef(); const handleClick = direction => { if(direction === "left"){ listRef.current.style.transform = `translateX(230px)` } } return (
Continue to watch
handleClick("left")} className="arrow left"/>
handleClick("right")} className="arrow right"/>
) } export default List
